title: Mini Hackathon â€“ Last session of the semester
description: Hackathon is an event where people brainstorm an idea, pitch it, then begin realizing (as in building a prototype) the idea in a limited time.  In this 5 hours mini hackathon from 10am to 3pm, you will be working in groups of 5 (including 1 App Club legend) for the duration of the mini hackathon.
body:
Hackathon is an event where people brainstorm an idea, pitch it, then begin realizing (as in building a prototype) the idea in a limited time.

In this 5 hours mini hackathon from 10am to 3pm, you will be working in groups of 5  (including 1 App Club legend) for the duration of the mini hackathon.

[Ticket](https://www.facebook.com/events/286682598439951/)
